dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup
News Content: Graphic: Images: Justin Sullivan, David Paul Morris/Bloomberg, Chesnot, Justin Sullivan / Staff

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off earlier this week that saw chip leader Nvidia lose almost $600 billion in market value — a record-setting loss for a U.S. company.

Meanwhile, investors awaited earnings results from Meta, Microsoft, and Apple.

Read about this and more in this week’s AI news roundup.

Microsoft stock falls almost 5% after modest Azure growthMicrosoft CEO Satya Nadella at OpenAI DevDay on November 6, 2023 in San Francisco, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) shares fell by around 5% during after-hours trading on Wednesday after it reported Azure cloud computing growth toward the bottom range of expectations.

Read More

Meta stock climbs after earnings beat on AI, smart glassesMeta CEO Mark Zuckerberg wearing Orion AR glasses during Meta Connect in Menlo Park, California on September 25, 2024. - Photo: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Meta (META) stock climbed by around 4% in after-hours trading after chief executive Mark Zuckerberg said on the company’s earnings call that it plans to invest “hundreds of billions of dollars” in artificial intelligence infrastructure in the long term.

Read More

Alibaba says it has an AI model even better than DeepSeekAlibaba Group at Viva Technology on June 14, 2023 in Paris, France. - Photo: Chesnot (Getty Images)

Days after Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off, a homegrown rival said its new AI model performed even better.

Read More

Microsoft thinks China’s DeepSeek might have used OpenAI’s tech before its big breakthroughIn this photo illustration, the DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Image: Justin Sullivan / Staff (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) and OpenAI are investigating whether a group connected to the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek accessed OpenAI’s data without permission, according to a new report.

Read More

Big Tech has a big DeepSeek problemDeepSeek logo displayed on a smartphone. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

Big Tech’s multi-billion dollar spending on artificial intelligence will be under investor scrutiny this week — even more so after China’s DeepSeek sent shockwaves through Wall Street and Silicon Valley with a cheap yet competitive AI model.

Read More

The White House is looking into DeepSeek over national security concernsThe DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Illustration: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

The White House is looking into national security concerns over the Chinese artificial intelligence app DeepSeek after its developer prompted a global tech sell-off.

Read More

DeepSeek is the ‘Temu of AI,’ analysts sayPhoto: Greg Baker/AFP (Getty Images)

After traders sold off global technology stocks en masse Monday on news of a Chinese artificial intelligence competitor, some aren’t too concerned with DeepSeek’s seemingly meteoric rise.

Read More

Trump says DeepSeek’s AI bombshell should be a ‘wake-up call’ for Big TechDonald Trump addresses the 2025 Republican Issues Conference at the Trump National Doral Miami on January 27, 2025 in Doral, Florida. - Photo: Joe Raedle (Getty Images)

The release of DeepSeek-R1, a new open-source reasoning model from a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, should be a “wake-up call” for the U.S. tech industry, President Donald Trump said.

Read More

LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman just raised $25 million to take on cancer with AIReid Hoffman, partner at Greylock Partners, during the Bloomberg Technology Summit in San Francisco, California, US, on Thursday, May 9, 2024. - Image: Bloomberg / Contributor (Getty Images)

LinkedIn (MSFT) co-founder and venture capitalist Reid Hoffman on Monday launched an AI startup aimed at discovering new treatments for cancer.

Story Continues

Read More

Big Retail is bringing out Big AI. Consumers might not even noticeNRF ‘25 Retail’s Big Show in New York on Jan. 14, 2025. - Photo: Francisco Velasquez/Quartz

AI is no longer just a buzzword in retail. It’s a tool retailers are increasingly deploying to transform their business operations.

Read More

Apple earnings are coming. Here’s what to expectApple CEO Tim Cook at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference on June 5, 2023 in Cupertino, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Apple (AAPL) is expected to release its fiscal first quarter results after the market closes on Thursday.

Read More

Nvidia is doing damage control after DeepSeek’s AI advance routed the stockNvidia headquarters on February 23, 2024 in Santa Clara, California. - Photo: Andrej Sokolow/picture alliance (Getty Images)

Nvidia (NVDA) addressed its tumbling stock on Monday by saying Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek will need more of its chips for new models.

Read More

DeepSeek is limiting sign-ups after a ‘large-scale’ cyberattackDeepSeek, a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, is raising questions over the U.S.’s dominance in the field. - Image: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek said it would temporarily limit signups after being the victim of “large-scale malicious attacks” on its servers.

Read More

Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is rattling markets. Here’s what to knowPhoto illustration of DeepSeek’s logo on a smartphone screen. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

A Chinese artificial intelligence startup is rattling Silicon Valley and Wall Street after it demonstrated AI models on par with OpenAI’s — for a fraction of the cost and energy.

Read More

For the latest news, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.35, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.65, Reasoning: The news highlights a significant sell-off in tech stocks triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised concerns about competition and market dynamics. While Apple is set to report earnings, the overall sentiment in the tech sector is negative due to the impact of DeepSeek on major players like Nvidia and Microsoft. This could lead to cautious trading around Apple's stock, especially if the earnings report does not meet expectations. Given the current market environment and the potential for negative sentiment to affect Apple's stock, there is a higher probability of a price decline than an increase.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed picture for Apple (AAPL). On one hand, there's general concern about the rise of Chinese AI, particularly DeepSeek, which has caused market volatility and scrutiny of Big Tech's AI investments. This could negatively impact investor sentiment towards Apple, especially if its AI strategy is perceived as lagging. The fact that Nvidia had to address its tumbling stock due to DeepSeek's advance suggests a real competitive threat. However, the article also mentions that Apple's earnings are coming up, and the market's reaction will depend on those results. Meta's positive reaction to its earnings beat, driven by AI investments, suggests that strong earnings and a clear AI strategy could boost Apple's stock. The overall market sentiment seems cautious due to DeepSeek, but a strong earnings report from Apple could offset this concern. Given the uncertainty surrounding the earnings report and the general market unease, I'm assigning a slightly lower probability of a rise than a fall.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25, Reasoning: The news article highlights the overall positive sentiment surrounding AI and its impact on the tech sector, with Apple (AAPL) positioned as a significant player.  However, the article also notes that Apple's recent integration of AI into its products, while generating record revenue, hasn't resulted in a significant sales boost for the iPhone 16.  This suggests that the market's immediate reaction to Apple's AI initiatives might be muted.  The article's ranking of AAPL as only 6th on Coatue's list of most important AI stocks further tempers expectations of a dramatic price surge. While the long-term prospects for Apple in the AI space are positive, the short-term impact of this specific news is likely to be less pronounced. The overall market sentiment towards AI is bullish, which could provide some support to AAPL, but the lack of immediate, substantial financial gains from Apple's AI integration suggests a more moderate price movement.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.85, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.15, Reasoning: The news headline indicates that Apple's stock rose after the company posted better-than-expected earnings and provided guidance for solid growth. Positive earnings surprises and strong growth projections typically lead to increased investor confidence and demand for the stock, which drives the price up. Given this information, the probability of the stock price rising is high, while the probability of it falling is low.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: Apple Inc. (AAPL) stock price rose 3.4% in premarket trading following a strong sales growth forecast. The company's executives forecast relatively strong sales growth, indicating a recovery from a dip in iPhone sales as it rolls out AI features. This positive forecast and the subsequent rise in premarket trading suggest a favorable short-term outlook for the stock. However, the broader market's reaction to the upcoming inflation data and the Federal Reserve's policy decisions could influence the stock's movement. Given the positive premarket performance and forecast, there is a higher likelihood of the stock price rising than falling.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3, Reasoning: The news indicates that Apple iPhone sales have increased in markets where artificial intelligence features have been rolled out, which is a positive sign for the company. However, the limited rollout of these features has also had a negative impact. Considering the overall positive impact of AI on sales, it's likely that the stock price will rise, but the limited rollout might temper the increase. Therefore, I estimate a higher probability of the stock price rising than falling.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7, Reasoning: The financial news highlights concerns about Apple's struggle to innovate in AI, coupled with a downgrade from Oppenheimer and challenges in the Chinese market. These factors indicate negative sentiment towards the company's future growth prospects, particularly in AI, which could lead to a decline in investor confidence.


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news paints a mixed picture for Apple. The rise of DeepSeek and its potential impact on the tech industry, coupled with Microsoft's Azure growth disappointment, creates a negative backdrop. However, Meta's positive earnings driven by AI investments offer a counterpoint. The article specifically mentions Apple's upcoming earnings, making them a crucial factor. Given the overall uncertainty and the potential for DeepSeek to negatively impact sentiment, I'm leaning towards a slightly higher probability of a price fall, but a strong earnings report could easily reverse this.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.45,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.55
}
```
